item.title: 10 Jan 2021 21:33
item.description:
I’ve been sitting on the ledge for a while now and Whatsapp’s latest ultimatum is just what I needed to see myself out the doors.I value my freedom and privacy way more than the perceived convenience and I’ve deleted my Whatsapp account for good.#whatsapp https://t.co/zDTFwp1eV1

Link to Tweet
item.content:encoded:
